scripts.build: go run github.com/syumai/workers/cmd/workers-assets-gen -mode=go && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o ./build/app.wasm .
scripts.generate-types: go tool oapi-codegen -package api -generate types -o generated/types.go tsp-output/@typespec/openapi3/openapi.yaml
scripts.generate-server: go tool oapi-codegen -package api -generate server -o generated/server.go tsp-output/@typespec/openapi3/openapi.yaml
